body.p: The Gentoo Monthly Newsletter is intended to give users of Gentoo one source of information about Gentoo. The GMN summarizes the key events in the Gentoo project each month and presents them in a clear, concise format.
The GMN will be distributed via the web (HTML). To subscribe to the GMN blog, use the form in the GMN website. You can also monitor our and
For feedback, comments or if you are interested in helping us out, drop in an email to gmn@gentoo.org.
